testcase.name: testFindAll

error.message: ### Error building SqlSession. ### The error may exist in SQL Mapper Configuration ### Cause: org.apache.ibatis.builder.BuilderException: Error parsing SQL Mapper Configuration. Cause: org.apache.ibatis.datasource.DataSourceException: There was an error configuring JndiDataSourceTransactionPool. Cause: javax.naming.NoInitialContextException: Need to specify class name in environment or system property, or as an applet parameter, or in an application resource file: java.naming.factory.initial
